text: The New Zealand Cycle Classic (previously known as the Tour of Wellington) is a road cycling race held in and around the Wairarapa near Wellington, New Zealand. The race is a men's competition over five stages and part of the UCI Oceania Tour. ==Winners== ==Multiple victories== {| class="wikitable" |- !Wins !Name !Country !Years |- |align=center| 4 ||Brian Fowler || ||align=left| 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992 |- |align=center rowspan=2| 2 ||Ric Reid || ||align=left| 1994, 1996 |- |Hayden Roulston || ||align=left| 2006, 2007 |- |} ==References== * Results ==External links== *New Zealand Cycle Classic Category:Cycle races in New Zealand New Zealand Cycle Classic Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in New Zealand Category:Summer events in New Zealand
title: New Zealand Cycle Classic
